sentence: Unilever NV ( UN ) will begin trading ex-dividend on August 06, 2014.
A cash dividend payment of $0.3842 per share is scheduled to be paid on September 10, 2014.
Shareholders who purchased UN stock prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an -2.44% decrease from the prior quarter.
At the current stock price of $40.69, the dividend yield is 3.78%.
The previous trading day's last sale of UN was $40.69, representing a -8.38% decrease from the 52 week high of $44.41 and a 11.27% increase over the 52 week low of $36.57.
UN is a part of the Basic Industries sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever PLC ( UL ).
Zacks Investment Research reports UN's forecasted earnings growth in 2014 as 2.66%, compared to an industry average of 3.7%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the UN Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
